text: George Horvath (14 March 1960 - 3 May 2022) was a Swedish modern pentathlete. He competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics. He won a bronze medal in the team event. Horvath was born in Danderyd, Sweden. Horvath died on 3 May 2022. He was 62 years old.George Horvath ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Modern pentathletes Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Sweden
title: George Horvath
